__e: I love him so much and I want to be a good mother and I know I have to be stronger, but I just don't think I can look in his eyes and not give him what he wants.
I know you and the Drillbit I know isn't capable of really doing it!
Like I've killed someone and I will never be able to look them in the eye and say, "I'm sorry".
"The police won't be able to do anything, if you don't tell us"
But I don't know if I'm ready to not be able to do my job, to be who I am.
And I know that I'm doing it, but I'm incapable of doing what needs to be done.
I'm not sure what it is, but I can't make them taste as good as when we made them, together.
But I don't know if I'm ready to not be able to do my job, to be who I am.
And I know that I'm doing it, but I'm incapable of doing what needs to be done.
You're not fit to be a husband or a father,
And, and you are incapable of being nice to people unless there's something in it for you.
Now, your mother, she is an amazing person, and she loves you very much, but she's completely and utterly incapable of getting tough with you and telling you the things that you need to hear.
Are you afraid I couldn't get those two behind me?
I am incapable of maintaining a long-term relationship with anybody.
After today, I might never have children.
You've gone through life unloved, and thus unable to love.
But, then I saw you and I realized that I don't want to be one of those guys that ends up alone, unable to love anybody.
Truth is, you aren't capable of loving anybody but yourself.
